title: ICT-Enabled Social Media-Film-Based English Education Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and vocabulary understanding, fundamental digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: A project-based course designed to provide learners (current professionals) with real-life English learning experiences using ICT tools.

learning_goals: Learners can produce 5-minute English presentation materials using digital tools by analyzing film clips.
Learners can improve their English writing skills by exchanging peer feedback (at least twice) through social media platforms.
Learners can complete a 5-page English project report in groups of three using online collaboration tools (e.g., Google Docs).

resources: Access Rights to Film Clip Library

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
